Name: Nash Racing: 70 seconds left
About the game: Game story: You are again criminal Kevin Nash. You have 70 seconds time to find money piles at different tracks. First you control player character and you need find black supercar. After that you need drive as fast as you can, but need also beware different traps like fire traps which cause fire damages to car and car can also explode. There is also police cars and spike traps. Spike traps cause flat tires, then car handling is very difficult and you can't drive very fast with empty tires. Also some levels contains ramps and breakable glasses. Different surfaces affect car handling. There is sand roads, asphalt roads, wet asphalt roads and wet roads. So drive as fast as you can and find money Features:: - 18 tracks - Test area - Lot of steam achievements - Car has damage system - Fire traps which cause car fire damage and car explosion - Spike traps which cause flat tires - Breakable glasses - surface detection. Car handles differently at different surfaces
